dcterms:title: Goron Gaiyyata
dcterms:creator: Muhammad Auwal Albani Zaria
dcterms:description: Sheikh M.A.A. Albani warned politicians and the rich to stop taking everything into their homes.|Sheikh M.A.A. Albani ya yi gargadi da janhankali ga yan siyasa da mai kudi kan su daina kai masa komai gidansa don baya bukata amma shi yana da shi.
dcterms:rights: In Copyright - Rights-Holder(s) Unlocatable or Unidentifiable
bibo:content:
00:01 – 17:20
Bayani akan abin da yake damunsa ga ‘yan siyasa game da abubuwan nan da suke kai a matsayin kyauta ko cin hanci.
Ni dan kasuwa ne bana neman komai ga wani dan siyasa, don ni dan kasuwa ne.
Mu ‘yan salafiyya bamu son komai agurin ku, sai dai muna son ku yi wa jama’a aikin da suke so.
A yanzu, ni dai ba zaka ba ni wani abu dan ka burge ni ba da sunan kyauta kamar mota, gida ko aure.

The Islamic scholar advises politicians and rich people to stop sending food and other goods to his house as gifts. Alabani says he is a businessman, not a bagger, because that is not charity but bribery, so he doesn't need anything as a gift from anyone, especially politicians.

dcterms:title: Demokuradiyyah
dcterms:creator: Muhammad Auwal Albani Zaria
dcterms:description: Sheikh M.A.A. Albani Zaria teaches how Muslims run government, politically, socially and morally according to Islamic religious leadership with reasoning with regard to Islamic scholars and tells the difference between polity and democracy in Islam.|Sheikh M.A.A. Albani Zaria ya karantar da mu yadda musulunchi ya karantar da yadda ake gudanar da tsarin mulki, da shugabanchi da siyasa a musulumchi, da kuma bayani akan bambanchin dake tsakanin siyasa da demokuradiyya bisa hujjoji daga littafan malamai yayin gabatar da laccar mai lacca demokuaradiyya.
dcterms:subject: Djihad|Jeunesse musulmane|Pluralisme religieux

dcterms:title: In an bugi jaki... Habaa shehi!!!? Rigiji gabji
dcterms:creator: Muhammad Auwal Albani Zaria
dcterms:description: This video contains a message from Sheikh Albani Zaria to the Sheikh of Tijaniyyah Dahiru Bauchi. It shows the importance and meaning of the position of Islam and the meaning of Christianity and an explanation of who they are "Izala and their Sufs and an explanation of who the Christians are and their Sufs and an explanation of whether it is permissible for a Muslim to vote for an infidel if a Muslim is also competing.|Wannan Video ne ta Qunshi Sako Da Sheikh Albani Zaria Ya Turawa Shehin tarikan Tidjaniyyah Dahiru Bauchi. Sheikh M.A.A Albani ya tunatar da mu irin matsayin musulunci da na’anar kiristanci, da bayani akan cewa suwaye “Yan izala da suffofinsu, da bayani akan cewa suwaye kiristoci, da suffofinsu da bayani akan cewa ko ya halatta musulmi ya zabi kafiri idan harda musulmi shima yana takara.
